solution_line_template: He gained a basil plant when one of the basil plants seeded a new plant, so he had {initial_plants} + {gained_basil} = <<{initial_plants}+{gained_basil}={plants_after_gain}>>{plants_after_gain} plants.
The rabbit ate both mint plants, so Gilbert had {plants_after_gain} - {mint_eaten} = <<{plants_after_gain}-{mint_eaten}={final_plants}>>{final_plants} herb plants when spring ended.
